dcterms:creator: P. Bergmann
K. Batzner
M. Fauser
D. Sattlegger
C. Steger
dcterms:description: A specialized extension of the MVTec LOCO dataset, aimed at filling a critical gap in the realm of logical anomaly detection in industrial scenarios. It categorizes logical anomalies into four main types based on scenarios: Quantity Anomalies, Size Anomalies, Position Anomalies, and Matching Anomalies, providing detailed explanations for each anomaly.
dcterms:title: LOCO-Annotations

dcterms:creator: P. Bergmann
K. Batzner
M. Fauser
D. Sattlegger
C. Steger
dcterms:description: A comprehensive real-world dataset for unsupervised anomaly detection, focusing on both structural and logical anomalies in industrial images.
dcterms:title: MVTec AD

dcterms:creator: P. Bergmann
K. Batzner
M. Fauser
D. Sattlegger
C. Steger
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for studying and resolving advanced semantic logic anomalies in industrial settings.
dcterms:title: MVTec LOCO
